title: Volume
summary: Control microphone and speaker audio levels.
short_description: Control microphone and speaker audio levels.
description: This skill controls the audio level and mute status for the default input and output device. You may increment volume, set to a specified level, or mute/unmute. You may also query the current volume and microphone level.
troubleshooting: Make sure the correct default audio devices are selected (see `3. Setting Up Hardware` in the instructions).
